Translations.Text: Renmen a! Nimen cai shi xuqiu zhenzhu de, zhenzhu que shi wu qiu de, que shi ke song de.
Ruguo ta yiyu, ta jiang huimie nimen, er chuangzao xin de zhongsheng.
Na dui zhenzhu bushi fannan de.

Yige fu zui zhe, bu zai fu bieren de zui; yige fu zhongzui zhe, ruguo jiao bieren lai ti ta fu zui, namo, bieren sui shi ta de jinqin, ye buneng ti ta danfu yi sihao. Ni zhi neng jinggao zai mimi zhong jingwei zhu, qie jin shou bai gong zhe. Xidi shenxin zhe, zhi wei ziji er xidi. Zhenzhu shi weiyi de guisu.
Mangren he fei mangren bu xiangdeng,
hei'an yu guangming ye bu xiangdeng,
beiyin he dang yang ye bu xiangdeng,
huo ren he siren ye bu xiangdeng. Zhenzhu bi shi ta suo yiyu zhe neng tingwen, ni jue buneng shi zai fen zhong de ren neng tingwen,
ni zhishi yige jinggao zhe.
Wo que yi shi ni ben zhenli er wei baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe. Meiyou yige minzu ze yi, zhiyao you yige minzu, qizhong jiu you jinggao zhe cengjing shiqule.
Ruguo tamen fouren ni, namo, zai tamen zhiqian shiqu zhe, yi fourenle; tamen zu zhong de shizhe ceng zhaoshi tamen mingzheng, tian jing he canlan de jingdian.
Ranhou, wo cheng fa liao bu xindao zhe, wo de qianze shi zenyang de?
Nandao ni hai bu zhidao ma? Zhenzhu cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, ranhou jie yushui er shengchan gezhong guoshi. Shanshang you bai de, hong de, gese de tiaowen, he qihei de yanshi.
Renlei, yeshou he shengchu zhong, ye tongyang di you butong de zhonglei. Zhenzhu de pu ren zhong, zhiyou xuezhe jingwei ta. Zhenzhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi she de.
Songdu zhenzhu de jingdian, qie jin shou bai gong, bing mimi de huo gongkai di fen she wo suo ciyu tamen de caiwu zhe, tamen xiwang zhe jingying bu pochan,
yibian ta shi tamen xiangshou ziji de wanquan de baochou, bing ba ta de enhui jia ci tamen; ta que shi zhi she de, que shi shan bao de.
Wo suo qishi ni de, que shi zhenli, zu zheng yiqian de jingdian shi zhenshi de. Zhenzhu duiyu ta de pu renmen que shi che zhi de, que zui mingcha de.
Ranhou, wo shi wo suo jianxuan de pu renmen jicheng jingdian; tamen zhong you zi qi de, you zhong he de, you feng zhen zhu de mingling er zhengxian xingshan de. Na que shi hong en.
Changzhu de leyuan, tamen jiang ru qizhong, tamen zai limian, dai de shi jin zhuo he zhenzhu, chuan de shi sichou.
Tamen shuo:`Yiqie zansong, quan guizhen zhu! Ta quchu women de youchou. Women de zhu, que shi zhi she de, que shi shan bao de.
Ta shi women juzhu zai changzhu de fangwu zhong, na shi chu yu ta de enhui. Women zai limian, hao bu xinku, hao bu pijuan.'
Bu xindao zhe, jiang zao huo yu de huoxing, ji bu pan tamen sixing, rang tamen siwang; you bu jianqing tamen suo zao de huoxing. Wo zheyang baochou yiqie wang'en de renmen.

Tamen zai limian qiujiu shuo:`Women de zhu a! Qiu ni fang women chuqu, women jiang gaiguo qian shan.'Nandao wo meiyou yanchang nimen de shoushu, shi neng juewu zhe you juewu de shijian ma? Jinggao zhe yi jianglin nimenle. Nimen changshi xingfa ba, buyi zhe jue meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe.
Zhenzhu que shi quanzhi dadi de youxuan de, ta que shi quanzhi xinshi de.

Ta shi nimen wei dadishang de dai zhi zhe. Buxindao zhe zi shou qi buxin de baochou; buxindao zhe de bu xin, zhi shi tamen zai tamen de zhu nali shou tonghen; bu xindao zhe de bu xin, zhi shi tamen geng meng kui she.

Ni shuo:`Nimen gaosu wo ba, nimen she zhenzhu er qidao di naxie pei zhu, zenme ying shou chongbai ne? Nimen gaosu wo ba! Tamen ceng duzi chuangzaole da di de na yibufen ne? Haishi tamen ceng yu zhenzhu gongtong chuangzao zhu tian ne? Haishi zhenzhu ceng shouyu tamen yi ben jingdian, er tamen shi yiju na ben jingdian zhong de xuduo mingzheng ne?'Buran, buyi zhe jin yi qipian huxiang ying xu.
